$interpreted: Experiment: Gao~ooo~?
Experiment: GAOOO!
Nolva: ......
Aosta: You did this?
Nolva: Dr. Clovis, please listen to me. I...
Nolva: Eh?
Nolva: I'm not controlled by the monster anymore? How?
Aosta: So there indeed is a monster. My speculations were correct.
Nolva: You knew already? That medicine you gave me, what exactly was it?
Aosta: That medicine only increases the purity of your own Soul Energy. That allows you to maintain your consciousness while you are sleeping. That's all.
Nolva: S-Soul...Energy?
Aosta: That monster has been existing inside for a long time. My monster alarm was not defective on your first visit; it was merely doing its job.
Aosta: MX46 attacked you for the same reason. Both it and the alarm reacted because they detected the monster.
Nolva: B-Been existing in me for a long time? How is that possible!
Nolva: W-W-What should I do? What should I do!?
Aosta: Calm down first. Come in and then we can talk.
Aosta: All in all...
Aosta: The monster's Soul Energy has invaded your system and has affected your own Soul Energy.
Aosta: The two types of Soul Energy wrestle with each other, thus creating an imbalance in you. That's the reason you randomly fall into deep slumbers.
Nolva: Can you...explain it in a way I can understand?
Aosta: ......
Aosta: Simply put, you are currently sharing your body with a monster. Whenever you enter your slumber, the monster inside you will surface to control you.
Nolva: There's a monster in my body all this time!? That's not possible; grandpa never told me anything about this...
Nolva: You must be lying to me!
Aosta: In both the civilian districts you previously lived in and the prairie village you currently live in, similar incidents of random assault have been reported.
Aosta: Coincidentally, those assaulted also happen to be people who've held grudges with you. These clues are what allowed Yamitsuki to track you down.
Nolva: Are you saying... that I was the one who assaulted all those people?
Aosta: Strictly speaking, "he" was the one that assaulted them. The thing that intrigues me is that "he" seems to have some unique...feelings for you.
Aosta: Therefore, I wanted to let you...yourself...
Nolva: Wait...then the mother and son I met on the prairie that day...did I also...
Nolva: No...impossible...
Nolva: There must be a mistake...this is all a lie!

Model.Text: Gao~ooo~?
GAOOO!
You did this?
Dr. Clovis, please listen to me. I...
Eh?
I'm not controlled by the monster anymore? How?
So there indeed is a monster. My speculations were correct.
You knew already? That medicine you gave me, what exactly was it?
That medicine only increases the purity of your own Soul Energy. That allows you to maintain your consciousness while you are sleeping. That's all.
S-Soul...Energy?
That monster has been existing inside for a long time. My monster alarm was not defective on your first visit; it was merely doing its job.
MX46 attacked you for the same reason. Both it and the alarm reacted because they detected the monster.
B-Been existing in me for a long time? How is that possible!
W-W-What should I do? What should I do!?
Calm down first. Come in and then we can talk.
All in all...
The monster's Soul Energy has invaded your system and has affected your own Soul Energy.
The two types of Soul Energy wrestle with each other, thus creating an imbalance in you. That's the reason you randomly fall into deep slumbers.
Can you...explain it in a way I can understand?
Simply put, you are currently sharing your body with a monster. Whenever you enter your slumber, the monster inside you will surface to control you.
There's a monster in my body all this time!? That's not possible; grandpa never told me anything about this...
You must be lying to me!
In both the civilian districts you previously lived in and the prairie village you currently live in, similar incidents of random assault have been reported.
Coincidentally, those assaulted also happen to be people who've held grudges with you. These clues are what allowed Yamitsuki to track you down.
Are you saying... that I was the one who assaulted all those people?
Strictly speaking, "he" was the one that assaulted them. The thing that intrigues me is that "he" seems to have some unique...feelings for you.
Therefore, I wanted to let you...yourself...
Wait...then the mother and son I met on the prairie that day...did I also...
No...impossible...
There must be a mistake...this is all a lie!
